title: New Hispanic Voices In Local Government + Your Turn
teaser: NEW HISPANIC VOICES IN LOCAL GOVERNMENT: In Prince George's County, where a growing Latino population reflects shifting demographics, voters chose the first Latinas to serve on the County Council and school board. We talk with two of them. (24 min.) YOUR TURN: A fatal Metro incident. Maryland's new governor. Pro football's "deflate-gate." We talk about those and other headlines on your mind. (28 min.)
